page.title: 01Summary of Our D Block
page.content: Our D Block is situated around the St.Ives and St.Leonards area. Our block contains a beautiful forest area where tourists and local people enjoy picnics, and leisurely walks. The Ministry Of Defence own a fair sized site,where they test new machinery to make sure it is safe and roadworthy. Boundary Lane runs through the middle of our block.It is called Boundary Lane because it used to be the boundary between Dorset and Hampshire. There are a number of houses off Boundary Lane ,along with a large scrap yard. It is a very pleasant rural area and it is nice to live away from an industrial area.
